title: AWS Launches Its Take on an Open Source AI Agents SDK
author: Frederic Lardinois
description: AWS today launched a new SDK for building AI agents, with support for LLMs from its own Bedrock service, LiteLLM and Ollama.
cntitle: AWS 发布其开源 AI Agents SDK
cndescription: AWS 今天发布了一个新的 SDK，用于构建 AI 代理，支持来自其 Bedrock 服务、LiteLLM 和 Ollama 的 LLM。
